meanings.definition: A person who treats the feet and their ailments.
meanings.sent1: The chiropodists helped people with foot problems.
meanings.sent2: I visited the chiropodists to get relief for my sore feet.
meanings.sent3: The chiropodists made sure everyone left with happy feet.
meanings.sent4: To the chiropodists, feet were like puzzles waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The chiropodists' clinic was filled with the soothing scent of foot creams.

meanings.definition: The practice of treating the feet and their ailments.
meanings.sent1: Chiropodists focus on foot health and wellness.
meanings.sent2: Studying chiropodists' methods can help improve foot care.
meanings.sent3: The chiropodists' office was always bustling with foot-related chatter.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chiropodists, every foot had a story to tell.
meanings.sent5: The chiropodists' dedication to feet was truly admirable.
